H3.text: what country did toussaint l'ouverture help free. Haiti

A4.text: Toussaint Louverture was born as a slave in the French colony of Saint-Domingue, now known as Haiti.

A5.text: Louverture is now known as one of the 'Fathers of Haiti'.
